remarks: A condition equivalent to " ` T ` is continuous" when ` T ` is linear. Theorem 3.5(iii) of [Beran] p. 99.  (Contributed by NM, 14-Feb-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
lnopcon $p |- ( T e. LinOp -> ( T e. ConOp <-> E. x e. RR A. y e. ~H ( normh ` ( T ` y ) ) <_ ( x x. ( normh ` y ) ) ) ) $.
$d T x y $.
